error.admin: Merci de ne pas exécuter AMRPC avec les droits d'administrateur !
error.jsFileExtension: Il y a une erreur avec la donnée d'association du fichier JS. Merci de cliquer sur le bouton ci-dessous pour en savoir plus.
error.cmd: Il y a une erreur avec le terminal de commande. Merci de cliquer sur le bouton ci-dessous pour en savoir plus.

music.title: Attention
music.description: The Music app could not be found. Please make sure that the Music app is installed.

discord.title: Attention
discord.description: Discord could not be found. Please make sure that Discord is installed.

note.language: If your language is missing, contact us.

cache.warn: WARNING Disabling the cache will delete all cached data.
cache.info: The cache stores all album artwork and other data to reduce the amount of requests to Apple. This will improve the loading time of the album artwork and link.

911.title: In memory of the victims of September 11
911.description:
To honor those who died on September 11 we added some custom album covers for these songs: %s
And when you want, you can change all of the covers (only for today).

appleEvent.title: Do not forget!
appleEvent.description: Today at %d o'clock (10a.m. PDT) is the Apple Event! Watch it live here: %s

newUpdate.title: Software Update
newUpdate.description: Version %version% is available for your PC.

installed.description: Version %version% is available for your PC and is ready to install.

ko-fi.title: Requires Premium
ko-fi.description: To use this feature, a one-time donation or a membership is required. You can donate here. If you have already donated, try to restart AMRPC. Learn More

microsoftStore.description: Did you know that you can install AMRPC from the Microsoft Store? But make sure to disable Auto Launch in the settings before installing it from the Microsoft Store.
